channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Incogni vs. Aura: What's your best option for maintaining online privacy?
item.description: Learn how Incogni and Aura fare against each other in features, pricing, customer support, user-friendliness, and reporting.

item.title: Patreon is adding tweet-like features and more recommended content
item.description: Patreon is introducing a suite of new features, and some of them are reminiscent of traditional social media platforms. The most obvious callback is something Patreon is calling Quips, which — you guessed it — are essentially tweets. Quips are smaller text, photo, or video posts that are public by default and open for anyone […]

item.title: The DJI Mini 4 Pro price plummets to a record low following the Mini 5 Pro launch – the older model is simply an excellent buy
item.description: 4K video up to 100fps, omnidirectional object sensing, sub-250g – it's a stunning feature set for the money

item.title: 2025 was a bad year for internet freedoms – here's the 3 cheapest ways to reclaim your digital rights
item.description: 2025 saw an increase in internet restrictions – from internet shutdowns to age-gated content. A VPN can help you navigate the chaos, and Black Friday VPN deals make it cheaper than ever.

item.title: Science Keeps Dismantling Trump’s Tylenol-Autism Scare
item.description: A new review shows a "lack of robust evidence" linking the use of Tylenol during pregnancy to either autism or ADHD.

item.title: Forget the robots – this is the reason AI is the best thing to happen since smartphone cameras
item.description: Google Photos' new Gemini Ask feature is the best photo answer engine you're probably not using – yet.

item.title: iRobot’s revenue has tanked and it’s almost out of cash
item.description: Things continue to look bleak for the original robot vacuum maker. iRobot’s third-quarter results, released last week, show that revenue is down and “well below our internal expectations due to continuing market headwinds, ongoing production delays, and unforeseen shipping disruptions,” said Gary Cohen, iRobot CEO, in a press release. This meant they had to spend […]...

item.title: Amazon's official Black Friday sale date revealed - preview the best deals from Bissell, Nike, Samsung, and more
item.description: Amazon has announced the dates for its official Black Friday sale, and I'm breaking down everything you need to know, plus today's best early deals.

item.title: Lenovo Black Friday laptop deals are live: up to 45% off ThinkPad, Yoga, and Legion
item.description: Lenovo's early Black Friday sale includes everything from super-cheap Windows 11 machines to high-end gaming laptops: here are today's best deals.

item.title: MLB pitchers Emmanuel Clase and Luis Ortiz indicted on bribery charges
item.description: Officials said Clase was not in custody, while Ortiz was arrested on Sunday by the FBI at Logan International Airport. Cleveland Guardians pitchers Emmanuel Clase and Luis Ortiz have been indicted on charges they took bribes from sports bettors to throw certain types of pitches, including tossing balls in the dirt instead of strikes, to ensure successful bets.According to the indictment unsealed Sunday in federal court in Brooklyn, the highly paid hurlers took several thousand dollars in payoffs to help two unnamed gamblers from their native Dominican Republic win at least $460,000 on in-game ...

item.title: Cdiscount crée la surprise du pré-Black Friday avec près de 40 % de remise sur le Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, le smartphone premium le plus abouti de sa génération
item.description: Le Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra 256 Go coûte 1 469 euros, sauf chez Cdiscount pendant le pré-Black Friday où il est disponible pour 918,99 euros.

item.title: Casting XXL pour notre émission Survoltés et double Matinale Tech’ : notre programme Twitch de la semaine, c’est juste ici
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du 10 novembre, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous, mercredi, jeudi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour profiter de la 19e de Survoltés.

item.title: Some Docker containers may not be as secure as they like, experts warn
item.description: Three high-severity flaws were recently discovered that could grant access to the underlying system.

item.title: Pour rattraper son retard sur l’IA, l’Europe prête à lâcher du lest sur la vie privée ?
item.description: Dans neuf jours, la Commission européenne présentera officiellement son grand projet de simplification des lois numériques, destiné à alléger la charge administrative des entreprises. Mais les projets de texte, publiés dans la presse européenne la semaine dernière, suggèrent des « changements énormes » : après l'AI Act, le RGPD, jusque-là intouchable, pourrait bel et bien subir un sacré coup de rabot. Au détriment de notre vie privée, pour plusieurs défenseurs du droit à la vie privée....

item.title: Anno 117: Pax Romana is a beautiful and refined city builder, but its simplicity might disappoint returning fans
item.description: Anno 117: Pax Romana isn’t as complex as its predecessor, but it’s still a gorgeous city builder that impresses across the board.

item.title: Snapchat is bringing back classic 2D Bitmoji
item.description: Snapchat+ subscribers will get the option to filter their Bitmoji with a new 2D style inspired by the original look. Bitmoji is going back to 2D.

item.title: Pré-Black Friday 2025 : voici les meilleures offres en DIRECT d’Amazon, Boulanger, Fnac, Darty…
item.description: De nombreux e-commerçants ont pris de l'avance sur le Black Friday cette année on retrouve dès maintenant de belles remises sur de nombreux produits Tech. Nous suivons les offres les plus intéressantes en temps réel pour vous présenter une sélection des meilleures promotions du moment, incluant les smartphones, ordinateurs, téléviseurs, objets connectés, etc. ...

item.title: Bose’s latest QuietComfort Ultra earbuds are $50 off ahead of Black Friday
item.description: If your upcoming holiday plans include a lot of travel, having a pair of noise-cancelling earbuds can help make the flight or train ride a little less chaotic. Bose’s second-generation QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds are among the best noise-canceling earbuds we’ve tested recently, and they’re on sale for a new all-time low of around $249 ($50 […]

item.title: Verizon will literally give you a free Nintendo Switch with an internet plan right now
item.description: You can upgrade your internet and get a free Nintendo Switch with Verizon right now.

item.title: Samsung n’épargne aucun de ses produits pour le pré-Black Friday, même le S25 Ultra y passe : voici le TOP 16 des offres à retenir
item.description: Samsung participe pleinement à cette période de pré-Black Friday. Smartphones, téléviseurs, tablettes, barres de son, vidéoprojecteurs et même aspirateurs-balais : la marque sud-coréenne casse les prix sur de nombreuses références récentes et populaires. Découvrez les meilleures offres à saisir dans cet article.

item.title: Smart Glasses Are Already Getting Ridiculously Light
item.description: Take a load off, Meta.

item.title: Test du Minisforum MS-S1 Max : l’ère du mini-PC limité à la bureautique est définitivement révolue
item.description: Pendant des années, on a maintenu une séparation nette : mini-PC compacts d'un côté pour le travail, tours imposantes de l'autre pour le gaming et les charges lourdes. Le Minisforum MS-S1 Max avec son AMD Ryzen AI Max+ 395 et ses 128 Go de mémoire unifiée vient bousculer cette logique.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Plus reappears in renders with a new camera island
item.description: Just two months ago, accepted wisdom was that there would be no Galaxy S26 Plus, Samsung’s mid-sized flagship canned in favor of a slim Edge phone. Now things have flipped, with the Edge supposedly cancelled and the Plus not only on track to release early next year, but revealed in new renders based on the […]

item.title: Powering AI Could Soon Use as Much Water as 10 Million Americans
item.description: Fortunately, a new study outlines a strategy to significantly curb AI's water consumption and carbon emissions.

item.title: Cette future voiture électrique se cache dans Fortnite, et c’est une Peugeot
item.description: Après quasiment sept ans de bons et loyaux services, la Peugeot e-208 va se renouveler ces prochains mois. La firme vient de présenter un concept pour le moins étonnant, directement intégré à Fortnite. De quoi préfigurer la prochaine 208.

item.title: Why Disney is all in on cruises, according to experiences chief Josh D’Amaro
item.description: Cruise mania is back in a big way, and with the launch of Destiny and more ships coming, he reveals what’s next and how Disney’s pushing its on-board storytelling forward. Disney has been in the cruise business for 27 years now, but over the past few years, the company has doubled down in an unprecedented manner. On November 20, the entertainment giant will see the inaugural sailing of the Disney Destiny, a 144,000 gross ton ship capable of carrying 4,000 passengers that is the latest in a growing fleet. It’s the fourth addition in the past four years. And five more ships are coming by 2031, w...

item.title: Consolidation begins to hit the carbon credit market
item.description: Carbon Direct is buying Pachama as the voluntary carbon markets enter a period of uncertainty.

item.title: Don’t trust big tech with your storage? Try this Proton plan, now on sale for an incredible 60% off this Black Friday
item.description: Looking to avoid the big players when it comes to storage? This independent non-profit could be your answer.

item.title: La prochaine montre Garmin embarquerait une nouveauté inédite et bienvenue
item.description: Selon les dernières informations en date, Garmin prépare quelque chose d'inédit pour un futur modèle de montre connectée. Voici à quoi cela pourrait ressembler.

item.title: Le pré-Black Friday liquide les stocks de smartphones premium : voici le meilleur des promos sur les iPhone d’Apple, Samsung Galaxy et Google Pixel
item.description: Le Black Friday est bien en avance cette année, et de tous les produits tech, ce sont les smartphones qui en profitent le plus. Samsung Galaxy, iPhone d'Apple, Google Pixel, Xiaomi Redmi, de l'entrée au haut de gamme, voyons ce que réservent les e-commerçants en ce début de Black November.

item.title: Sorry Sony Fans, the PS6 May Be Even More PC Than Console, Too
item.description: Get ready for the generation of consoles with the guts of a PC.

item.title: Paul Tagliabue, the NFL’s commissioner for 17 years, has died at 84
item.description: Tagliabue died in Chevy Chase, Maryland, from heart failure. Paul Tagliabue, who helped bring labor peace and riches to the NFL during his 17 years as commissioner but was criticized for not taking stronger action on concussions, died Sunday from heart failure. He was 84.NFL spokesman Brian McCarthy said Tagliabue’s family informed the league of his death in Chevy Chase, Maryland.Tagliabue, who had developed Parkinson’s disease, was commissioner after Pete Rozelle from 1989 to 2006. He was elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame as part of a special centennial class in 2020. Current Commissio...

item.title: Oscar Isaac Would Come Back to ‘Star Wars’ If Disney Is Done Capitulating to Fascism
item.description: The man behind Poe Dameron's X-Wing controls isn't giving up, as long as there's still light.

item.title: Researchers Discover Two Mysterious Voids in Giza Pyramid
item.description: A strangely smooth expanse of granite on the Menkaure Pyramid might be a second entrance.

item.title: Supreme Court rejects a Kentucky appeal to overturn nationwide same-sex marriage legislation
item.description: Kim Davis, a former Kentucky clerk, had been trying to get the court to side with her after she denied marriage licenses to same-sex couples. The Supreme Court on Monday rejected a call to overturn its landmark decision that legalized same-sex marriage nationwide.The justices, without comment, turned away an appeal from Kim Davis, the former Kentucky court clerk who refused to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples after the high court’s 2015 ruling in Obergefell v. Hodges.Davis had been trying to get the court to overturn a lower-court order for her to pay $360,000 in damages and attorne...

item.title: Samsung phones under threat from this dangerous new spyware cyberattack - here's how to stay safe
item.description: LandFall was deployed against targets using Samsung devices in the Middle East.

item.title: Apple Fitness+ transpire pour sa survie
item.description: Le service Fitness+ n'a pas encore la tête sur le billot, mais un gros nuage noir pointe à l'horizon. Apple aurait en effet mis cette activité sous surveillance, car le retour sur investissement serait très modeste.

item.title: YouTubers aren’t relying on ad revenue anymore — here’s how some are diversifying
item.description: YouTubers are no longer just creators, and in some cases, their side businesses are growing faster than their channels.

item.title: Google Maps releases new AI tools that let you create interactive projects
item.description: Google is debuting an agent that will generate code for you to build interactive Maps projects.

item.title: Avant-Black Friday smartphones à moins de 500 € : voici les meilleures offres Samsung Galaxy, Xiaomi Redmi et Nothing Phone
item.description: Si le Black Friday se fera attendre jusqu'à la fin du mois, les e-commerçants français n'ont eux pas attendu pour lancer des offres. Les smartphones font partie des produits qui profitent de réductions vraiment intéressantes, notamment sur l'entrée et le milieu de gamme.

item.title: « À plus de 250 euros, c’est nous qui avons la meilleure vente » : il n’y pas que les smartphones de Xiaomi qui cartonnent en France
item.description: Le patron de Xiaomi France nous apprend que les ventes de tablettes sont en croissance et que la marque compte bien surfer sur la vague.

item.title: Apple removes popular gay dating apps from Chinas App Store
item.description: Apple has removed top gay dating apps Blued and Finka from China's App Store, WIRED has reported.

item.title: The EPA Is in Chaos
item.description: “We learn who is furloughed when we send an email to someone and get the out-of-office message,” one employee tells WIRED.
